# Apply A Discount During Checkout

## Subcategory

## Article Content

HOME
SALES & CHECKOUT
SALES & CHECKOUT BASICS
Apply a Discount During Checkout

You can manually apply discounts during checkout, including:

Price discount

Percentage discount

Price discount plus an additional percentage discount

You can also set up discounts through offers that can be manually or automatically applied to eligible checkouts.

Link copied
Apply a discount during checkout

To manually apply a discount during checkout, select Change price next to the service.

Enter the modified price, percentage discount, or a combination of both. Select Apply and complete the checkout as you normally would.
